title: PDFpenPro - v6.1.2a Intel Key Gen Mac
description:
PDFpenPro
Version: - v6.1.2a

Mac Platform: Intel
Includes: KG

OS version: 10.7
Processor type(s) & speed: 1Ghz
RAM minimum: 512
Video RAM: 512

Link for more information: http://www.smilesoftware.com/PDFpenPro/index.html

Get all the PDF editing power of PDFpen, plus create and edit PDF forms and table of contents.

With PDFpenPro, you get special advanced features:

Convert websites to multi-page PDFs, complete with hyperlinks
Create and edit cross-platform fillable PDF forms
Create and edit document Table of Contents
Create form fields automatically in a non-interactive form
Edit document permissions to restrict saving, printing, copying, etc.
As well as all the PDF editing power of PDFpen:

Add text, images and signatures to PDF
Correct text in original PDF with editable text blocks
Move, resize, copy and delete images in original PDF
Redact or erase text, including OCR text; use search-and-redact or search-and-replace
Adjust resolution, color depth and contrast in an image or scanned document
Scan directly from Image Capture or TWAIN scanners
Perform OCR (Optical Character Recognition) on scanned documents
Insert and remove pages; re-order pages in a PDF by drag & drop; combine PDFs
Insert page numbers and specify positioning and format, including Roman numerals and Bates Numbering
Fill out interactive PDF forms
Copy and paste rich text; retain fonts and formatting when copying from PDFs
Select and copy text across multiple columns
Export to MicrosoftÃ‚Â® Word (.doc, .docx) format (requires Internet connection, must be licensed user)
Add (and print) notes and comments
Mark up documents with highlighting, underscoring and strikethrough
Save frequently-used images, signatures, objects and text in the Library
Autosaving and document versions
Save PDFs directly to Evernote
Automate PDF manipulations with AppleScript
Use iCloud (Mac App Store version only) or Dropbox for seamless editing with PDFpen for iPad and PDFpen for iPhone

6.1.2 updates:
Smile has rolled out PDFpen 6.1.2, an update to its all-purpose PDF editing tool for OS X. The update improves performance and reduces memory usage. PDFpen 6.1.2 also includes a number of minor fixes and improvements.
The changes in PDFpen 6.1.2 have also been made in PDFpenPro 6.1.2, the pro version that can also convert websites into PDFs, automatically create fillable PDF forms, and construct document table of contents. PDFpen 6.1.2 works with PDFpen for iPad and PDFpen for iPhone, allowing editing across devices when used with iCloud or Dropbox storage.
